screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .ggp file in OtterUI Editor 1.3
screenshot.caption: GGP file open in OtterUI Editor 1.3

description: OtterUI is a video game UI development toolkit that allows developers to create navigable menus and other animated scenes. These menus and scenes are saved within OtterUI projects, or GGP files.
A GGP file can contain any number of scenes, animations, and other scene elements. After a developer finishes editing a scene, they can export that scene as a .GBS file for use in a video game.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .ggp file in OtterUI Editor 1.3
images.caption: GGP file open in OtterUI Editor 1.3
